targets.query: SELECT mean("outputBytesAvg"), mean("inputBytesAvg") FROM "ftd_interfaceHealthMetrics" WHERE ("deviceName"::tag =~ /^$deviceName$/ AND "interface"::tag =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "interface"::tag fill(null)

SELECT mean("outputBytesAvg"), mean("inputBytesAvg") FROM "ftd_interfaceHealthMetrics" WHERE ("deviceName"::tag =~ /^$deviceName$/ AND "interface"::tag =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "interface"::tag fill(null)

from(bucket: "ftd")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ftd_cpuHealthMetrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "linaUsageAvg" or r["_field"] == "snortUsageAvg" or r["_field"] == "systemUsageAvg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "${deviceName}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ftd")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ftd_cpuHealthMetrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "systemUsageAvg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "${deviceName}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "ftd")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ftd_cpuHealthMetrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "linaUsageAvg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["deviceName"] == "${deviceName}")
  |> last()

SELECT last("interfaceName") AS "Logical Name",last("linkStatus") AS "Link Status",last("bufferOverrunsAvg") AS "Overruns", last("bufferUnderrunsAvg") AS "Underruns", last("dropPacketsAvg") AS "Dropped Pkts Avg",last("l2DecodeDropsAvg") AS "L2 Decode Drops Avg",last("inputErrorsAvg") AS "Input Errors Avg", last("outputErrorsAvg") AS "Output Errors Avg",last("inputPacketSizeAvg") AS "Input Packet Size Avg",last("outputPacketSizeAvg") AS "Output Packet Size Avg" FROM "ftd_interfaceHealthMetrics" WHERE ("deviceName"::tag =~ /^$deviceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "interface"::tag

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH key = "deviceName" WHERE deviceName != 'Hacks-Home-FTD [PRODUCTION!!!]' and deviceName != 'Paradise [!! PRODUCTION !!!]'
list.name: deviceName

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH key = "deviceName" WHERE deviceName != 'Hacks-Home-FTD [PRODUCTION!!!]' and deviceName != 'Paradise [!! PRODUCTION !!!]'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE deviceName = '${deviceName}'
list.label: Interface
list.name: interface

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE deviceName = '${deviceName}'
